home.hero_title: Import products from any Shopify store
home.hero_body: KOPPY lets you bulk-import products from any public Shopify store directly into your catalog. Titles, descriptions, images, variants, and prices — everything transfers automatically, with AI-rewritten descriptions to keep your content unique.
home.features_title: Everything you need to grow your catalog
home.feature_bulk_desc: Paste any public Shopify store URL and instantly preview all its products. Import hundreds of products in one click — titles, descriptions, variants, prices, and images included.
home.feature_ai_desc: Every imported product description is automatically rewritten by AI to be unique, SEO-friendly, and tailored to your brand voice — no manual editing required.
home.feature_realtime_desc: Watch your import queue process live. Track each product's status from pending to completed, with a live progress bar and instant notifications.
home.feature_images_desc: Product images are automatically downloaded, resized, and re-uploaded to your Shopify CDN — ensuring fast load times and full compatibility.
home.feature_variants_desc: Full support for product variants, options (size, color, material), SKUs, and inventory quantities. Complex products import perfectly.
home.feature_history_desc: Every import is logged with its status and Shopify product ID. Review past imports, spot failures, and track your entire import history.
home.step1_desc: Go to Import Products and paste any public Shopify store URL or a direct product URL.
home.step2_desc: Click Analyze to see all available products. Review the list before committing to import.
home.step3_desc: Click Import All and watch the real-time progress as products are added to your Shopify catalog.
home.cta_bottom_title: Ready to import your first products?
home.cta_bottom_body: It takes less than a minute. No configuration needed.
